Package org.restlet.ext.html

Support for the HTML (HyperText Markup Language) standard in its 4.0 version and above.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
FormData HTML form data composed of a name and a value.
FormDataSet HTML form supporting either URL encoding or multipart encoding.
HtmlConverter Converter between the HTML API and Representation classes.
 

Package org.restlet.ext.html Description

Support for the HTML (HyperText Markup Language) standard in its 4.0 version and above.

Since:
Restlet 2.1
See Also:
W3C HTML 4.0 specification, User Guide - HTML extension
